        public void exec(Game game,
                 PlayerColor shooter,
                 Expression weaponBehaviour,

        Executes shoot interaction if not already occupied
        Parameters:
        game - the game on which the shoot interaction will take place
        shooter - the shooter
        weaponBehaviour - the weapon behaviour used to shoot
